Package model

Class Chessboard

java.lang.Object
model.Chessboard
public class Chessboard
extends java.lang.Object
Chessboard used for all calculations, implements the singleton pattern
Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Chessboard getInstance()

    • reset

      public void reset()

    • createBoard

      public void createBoard​(int size)
      Constructor to set up a board of size * size for 2 Human players
      Parameters:
      size - Needs to be >0, recommended 8, entering very high/low values may break break the game

    • createBoard

      public void createBoard​(int size, boolean whiteAI, boolean blackAI)
      Constructor to set up a board of size * size for Human and A.I players Sets time to 5minutes and 0 Increment to 0
      Parameters:
      size - Needs to be >0, recommended 8, entering very high/low values may break break the game
      whiteAI - true to let A.I play white
      blackAI - true to let A.I play black

    • createBoard

      public void createBoard​(int size, boolean whiteAI, boolean blackAI, long whiteTime, long blackTime, long whiteInkrement, long blackInkrement)
      Constructor to set up a board of size * size for Human and A.I players, also enables to enter custom Time and Increment for both Players
      Parameters:
      size - Needs to be >0, recommended 8, entering very high/low values may break break the game
      whiteAI - true to let A.I play white
      blackAI - true to let A.I play black
      whiteTime - long time in seconds, should be >0
      blackTime - long time in seconds, should be >0
      whiteInkrement - increases timer for white by x seconds after making move
      blackInkrement - increases timer for black by x seconds after making move

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      Prints the Board to the console

      Adds Piece p to its corresponding ArrayList
      Parameters:
      p - Piece to add

      Parameters:
      p - Piece to delete
      Returns:
      returns true if Piece has been successfully removed

    • addPieceToEaten

      public void addPieceToEaten​(Piece p)
      Adds Piece to eatenPieces ArrayList, useful to keep references around so the GarbageCollector doesnt delete them after a Piece is taken
      Parameters:
      p - Piece to add

    • removePieceFromEaten

      public boolean removePieceFromEaten​(Piece p)
      Removes Piece from eatenPieces ArrayList
      Parameters:
      p - Piece to remove
      Returns:
      returns true if Piece has been removed successfully

    • getB_king

      public King getB_king()
      Quick way to get the Black king
      Returns:
      can be Null if King doesnt exist

    • getW_king

      public King getW_king()
      Quick way to get the Black king
      Returns:
      can be Null if King doesnt exist

    • handleTurn

      public boolean handleTurn​(Turn currentT)
      Handles turn for a Player and for A.I, also gets called by A.I when calculating best Move, for this Chessboard.debug and Chessboard.withTime gets set to false inorder to not display the move on Chessboard.View.
      Parameters:
      currentT - turn to handle, cannot be null
      Returns:
      true if the move is played successfully

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece​(Piece p, Field f)

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece​(Piece p, Field f, boolean s)
      Moves Piece to Field
      Parameters:
      p - Piece to move
      f - Field to move Piece to
      s - Play sound when making move

    • undoTurn

      public void undoTurn​(Turn t)
      sets game back to Turn t

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      Indicates that a Turn has been played, if Chessboard.debug is set to true displays move on view.ChessboardView Also if a A.I is set to true, Makes A.I take a turn

    • convertNotation

      public Turn convertNotation​(java.lang.String s)
      Converts chess notation into a Turn object
      Parameters:
      s - chess notation example e2e4
      Returns:
      Turn object

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • isLegal

      public boolean isLegal​(Field destination, Field start, Color color)
      checks if move would put king in check
      Parameters:
      destination - Field which Piece wants to move to
      start - Field of Piece
      color - color of Piece
      Returns:
      true if move is legal

    • getCastlePermissions

      public boolean[] getCastlePermissions()
      Returns:
      boolean Array with every Castle Permission [0] = white long castle permission(Queen side) [1] = white short castle permission(King side) [2] = black long castle permission(Queen side) [3] = black short castle permission(King side)

    • getPlaysAI

      public boolean[] getPlaysAI()
      Returns:
      [0] = white AI [1] = black AI

    • setPlaysAI

      public void setPlaysAI​(boolean[] playsAI)
      Parameters:
      playsAI - [0] = white A.I [1] = black A.I
